annotations.text: Only available on macOS, but of limited use in a click event: Holding down the CTRL key while clicking with the mouse is referred to as a 'CTRL click' under macOS and is interpreted as a right mouse click. In a default profile  the <var>dom.event.treat_ctrl_click_as_right_click.disabled</var> preference is not enabled and the <var>MacCtrl</var> modifier key is not forwarded to the API.
